title: FALL WINE SERIES
description: Sip It, Swish It, Swig It, Swill It! The summer may be winding down, but we’re still wining every 3rd Wednesday of the month from 6-8pm at Prospect Lounge in The Padre Hotel. Your admission to our signature Summer Wine Series includes vino and handcrafted bites.
button_text:
Tickets at the door

$15 general, $10 registered hotel guests
